content.question: The table most directly suggests which of the following developments by 1749 ?

choices.label: Native Americans refused to purchase British goods in order to achieve self-sufficiency.
Plantation owners began to rely on indentured servants to produce valuable cash crops.
Colonists became increasingly vulnerable to the transmission of epidemic diseases such as smallpox.
The British established increasingly extensive trade networks to provide goods to its colonies.

content.answer: The British established increasingly extensive trade networks to provide goods to its colonies.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
